effect.black-white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.
effect.black-2-white-2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

short_effect.black-white: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.black-white: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.
